Analysis of single-cell RNA-seq data

Axel Klenk

Dept. of Medicine and Life Sciences, Universitat Pompeu Fabra, Barcelona
axelvolker.klenk@upf.edu

Robert Castelo

Dept. of Medicine and Life Sciences, Universitat Pompeu Fabra, Barcelona
robert.castelo@upf.edu

2024-09-01

Source: vignettes/scRNAseq.Rmd
scRNAseq.Rmd

Vignette built using GSVA, version 1.53.16.

1 Importing scRNA-seq data into a SingleCellExperiment object 

library(TENxPBMCData)

sce <- TENxPBMCData(dataset="pbmc4k")
sce
#> class: SingleCellExperiment 
#> dim: 33694 4340 
#> metadata(0):
#> assays(1): counts
#> rownames(33694): ENSG00000243485 ENSG00000237613 ... ENSG00000277475
#>   ENSG00000268674
#> rowData names(3): ENSEMBL_ID Symbol_TENx Symbol
#> colnames: NULL
#> colData names(11): Sample Barcode ... Individual Date_published
#> reducedDimNames(0):
#> mainExpName: NULL
#> altExpNames(0):

2 Importing gene sets 

library(GSVA)

fname <- "PBMC_gene_sets_TrianaEtAl2021.gmt"
gsets <- readGMT(system.file("extdata", fname, package="GSVAEuroBioC2024"))
